Change Log: `yii2-dialog`
===================================

## Version 1.0.1

**Date:** 25-Jul-2016

- (enh #3): Add Chinese Translations.
- Add contribution templates.

- (enh #6): Add Polish Translations.

## Version 1.0.0

**Date:** 22-Feb-2016

- Initial release
- (enh #1): Add Dutch translations
